sentence.Network_en: The truck's headlights were all fuzzy and ghostlike.
sentence.Network_cn: 卡车的前灯光模糊一片,鬼火一样.

sentence.Network_en: All at once he looked up. The room was so still It'seemed ghostlike.
sentence.Network_cn: 突然他抬头一看, 屋里寂静得像是有幽灵一般.

sentence.Network_en: She nodded, thinking how ghostlike he seemed.
sentence.Network_cn: 她点点头, 想着他行动多像游魂.

auth_sentence.content: She found it open and the judge standing inside, ghostlike in his long white nightshirt.
